about_description: We are the first professional company in Azerbaijan that sells spare parts through a digital platform, mobile application and creates an analytical database for vehicles. On March 3, 2022, the Small and Medium Business Development Agency (KOBIA) in Azerbaijan awarded our company with a Startup Certificate. In addition to our field of activity, small and medium-sized businesses engaged in the sale of car parts, establishing business relationships with car repair and car services were included, and at the same time, a cooperation environment with drivers was created.
about_full: Our team has 20 years of professional experience in this field. In the first years of our activity, we carried out wholesale and retail sales of spare parts in Azerbaijan for various types of trucks and cars from all over the world. Having provided the sale of spare parts for various world brands and models, we realized that in order to expand this area, it is necessary to move on to innovative solutions in accordance with modern requirements. Thus, in 2018, together with our team, we launched a digital project, choosing a more convenient way for buyers and sellers. We have developed a web platform and a mobile application "OTOBAZA" for you.
project_vision_text:
By offering this product, we are confident that our website and mobile application will be useful for both spare parts sellers and buyers. The OTOBAZA platform creates a market environment between buyers and sellers without the involvement of third parties. In this environment, we have provided a convenient for Buyers selection of real prices for spare parts, and for Sellers the opportunity to negotiate with buyers.
One of the goals of the OTOBAZA project is automation and transparency between Drivers and Parts Dealers.
The OTOBAZA platform allows drivers to find stores selling spare parts and accessories.
Drivers can reach the address by ordering a spare part through the "OTOBAZA" platform.
Through the OTOBAZA platform, drivers can filter their search for parts by distance or price.
Drivers can find the necessary spare parts in the OTOBAZA mobile application in several ways:
  • By adding Request (to get a quick offer from stores)
  • With spareparts code (unique code set by the manufacturer)
  • Ability to search for spareparts by vehicle VIN (unique code)
  • Ability to search by the catalog (by brand, model, category spareparts and other parameters)
  • TechCard - İn this section you can get information about the work done in your transport and the next work to be done
Startup "OTOBAZA" is open to new opportunities, investments and other business partnerships.
terms_conditions_text:
1.   Agreement to Terms     

1.1  These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (you), and OTOBAZA AZERBAİJAN located at Baku, Azerbaijan (we, us), concerning your access to and use of the otobaza.com website as well as any related applications (the Site).  

The Site provides the following services: Spare parts marketplace (Services). You agree that by accessing the Site and/or Services, you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions.  

The site www.otobaza.com is an information platform and does not profit from the sale of spare parts on this site. All transactions are made directly between the buyer and the seller! Otobaza does not have all sales data for merchants, turnover figures are obtained by estimation.

If you do not agree with all of these Terms and Conditions, then you are prohibited from using the Site and Services and you must discontinue use immediately. We recommend that you print a copy of these Terms and Conditions for future reference.

3.2  If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, we may suspend or terminate your account. We may remove or change a user name you select if we determine that such user name is inappropriate.

items.title: Registration
items.desc: Register by entering your personal information and add your car to your personal garage.

items.title: Finding a spare part
items.desc: Find the spare parts you need for your car and choose the product according to the price and short distance from the list provided.

items.title: Purchase of spare parts
items.desc: Entering the selected product, obtaining detailed information about the Seller and ordering (purchasing) the product.

sellers.title: SELLERS
sellers.desc: You can order spare parts by contacting. You can repeat the step for other spare parts.

items.title: Registration
items.desc: Register by entering store information and creating a store.

items.title: Spare Parts Placement
items.desc: To download a list of spare parts in bulk or retail, download the sample EXCELL file and load it into the system.

items.title: Payment
items.desc: Select the required package according to the number of spare parts and pay for the number of clicks.

tariffs_desc: At the moment, all services offered by the site are free of charge.

plans.title: Profitability
plans.desc: If you are a seller, you can sell more and earn more at less costs. The more products you add, the more chances you have to sell.

plans.title: Save time
plans.desc: For the seller - save time spent looking for a customer. For the buyer - to get offers from a more diverse and close to you place without wasting time traveling.

plans.title: Variety width
plans.desc: A wider price comparison of the spare part you are looking for.

plans.title: Price differences
plans.desc: A wider price comparison of the spare part you are looking for

plans.title: Chance to be a Seller
plans.desc: Everyone has a chance to become a Seller and make a profit.

plans.title: Convenience of the system
plans.desc: Get the information you need simply by selecting your car or typing in the detail code.

how_work_dec:
Our goal is to provide you with the correct price and information from the nearest sellers.

You will be provided with a complete list of OEM, cross, duplicates and additional products that you are looking for, including the make, model or product code of your car.
drivers_desc: If you need spare parts for your car, you can contact Otobaza
otobaza_desc: You can find the necessary spare parts for your car and click on it to get contact information about the Sellers selling this product.
success_email: Your email address has been confirmed!
success_email_desc: Your account email address has been verified.
store_info_text: Attention! The Seller warrants the availability of this spare part and the price indicated on it. If the price and availability do not match, please let us know. OTOBAZA is not responsible for the accuracy of the information provided by the seller. We recommend that you read the terms of use.

system_error_info: There is a technical error in the link you entered. You can use the "Contact" section for technical assistance.
